title: The Flame's Daughter
overview: Sincere and cheerful, Juga the heiress of clan Laosinchai. Shrouded in mystery, the events of nineteen-year-old plunged her life into chaos. It will be in love with three men: holding aloof, arrogant of Feng, Yu quiet and gentle, friendly and talented Xue. Their story will be a painful whirlpool of love and hatred.
